clause_text: 2. Reservation proposed in Natural Area shall be allowed to be developed at par with other zones subject to approval of the Competent Authority and subject to compliance of conditions as mentioned in the notifications issued by the Ministry of Environment and Forest, if any, as amended from time to time.
